com.rift.coad.lib.interceptor
Class ServerInterceptor

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.interceptor.ServerInterceptor

public class ServerInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object

This object is responsible for authenticating the incoming thread using the credential information supplied.
